left.p: This is the main entry point to CDuce documentation.

box.title: Available documents
box.p: We mantain three kinds of on-line documentation: a User's guide where all CDuce constructions are grouped by categories and explained; a Tutorial where we give a gentle introduction to programming in CDuce; and a Quick reference card where we group and briefly explain in a single page CDuce syntax.

left.p: This page lists all the pages from the CDuce documentation.
